sections.name: subject
sections.definition: Subject-template template schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

sections.name: in2pb-header
sections.definition: Header to be used for metadata templates created for In2PB projects.

properties.name: in2pb-header
properties.definition: Header to be used for metadata templates created for In2PB projects.

sections.name: subject-header
sections.definition: Header with instructions for the subject metadata.

properties.name: subject-header
properties.definition: Header with instructions for the subject metadata.

sections.name: subject-general-element
sections.definition: Metadata relating to the subject of the experiment.

properties.name: subjectID
properties.definition: Unique identifier for the subject.

properties.name: subjectSpecies
properties.definition: Binomial species name from NCBI taxonomy

properties.name: subejctSpeciesStrain
properties.definition: String value indicating the strain of the species, for example: C57BL/6J.

properties.name: subjectSpeciesStrainRRID
properties.definition: Research resource identifier (RRID) of the strain of the species.

properties.name: subjectTrivialName
properties.definition: Commonly used species name.

properties.name: subjectAbbreviatedID
properties.definition: Abbreviated identifier of the subject, for instance, identifier used in file names.

properties.name: genotypic sex
properties.definition: Sex of the subject being defined.

properties.name: subjectBirthDate
properties.definition: Birthdate of the subject, if available.

properties.name: subjectAge
properties.definition: Age of the participant at time of begining of recording (first data point recorded) in years.

properties.name: subjectCharacter
properties.definition: Remarks on the general characteristics of the subject, if any.

sections.name: subject-training-element
sections.definition: Information on training of the animal.

properties.name: subjectID
properties.definition: Identifier of the subject who was trained.

properties.name: trainingType
properties.definition: Type of training being described.

properties.name: trainingStartDate
properties.definition: Date of the start of the training.

properties.name: trainingEndDate
properties.definition: Date of the end of the training.

properties.name: trainingCoaches
properties.definition: List of people responsible for training of the subject.

properties.name: trainingComments
properties.definition: Remarks on the training procedure.

sections.name: subject-surgery-element
sections.definition: Information on surgeries performed on of the animal.

properties.name: subjectID
properties.definition: Identifier of the subject on which the surgery was performed.

properties.name: surgeryType
properties.definition: Type of the surgery performed.

properties.name: subjectWeight
properties.definition: Weight of the subject at the start of surgery in kilograms.

properties.name: surgeryDuration
properties.definition: Duration of the surgery in hours.

properties.name: surgeonNames
properties.definition: List of people responsible for the surgery.

properties.name: surgeryHemisphere
properties.definition: Hemisphere on which the surgery was performed.

properties.name: surgeryAnatomicalLocation
properties.definition: List of anatomical locations of the surgery.

properties.name: surgeryComments
properties.definition: Remarks on the surgery.

sections.name: free-text-field
sections.definition: A free text element to allow the user to provide any additional information.

properties.name: free-text-field
properties.definition: A free text element to allow the user to provide any additional information.
